root.specsKey: Nikon Coolpix S9900 Point & Shoot Camera (Silver)
Shutter Speed: 1/2000 - 8 sec (When ISO Sensitivity is Fixed at ISO 125 or 200 in P, S, A or M Mode)
Interface Data Transfer Protocol: MTP, PTP, I/O terminal: Digital I/O (USB), NFC Connectivity
Built-in Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes

Lens Zoom: 30x, Digital Zoom: Upto 4x (Angle of View Equivalent to that of 3000 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Vibration Reduction: Combination of Lens-shift VR, Electronic VR, Aperture: Electronically Controlled 6 Blade Iris Diaphragm

Autofocus (AF) Focus Area Selecton: Center, Face Priority, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking, Target Finding AF, Focus Range (Macro Mode): (Wide-angle Position) (All Distances Measured from Center of Front Surface of Lens), Focus Lock: Yes

Top Continuous Shooting Speed at Full Resolution: Upto 5 Shots/7 fps, Continuous Shooting Options: Best Shot Selector, Continuous H, Continuous H 60, Continuous H 120, Continuous L, Pre-shooting Cache, Single
White Balance: Auto, Cloudy, Daylight, Flash, Fluorescent, Incandescent, White Balance Preset
ISO 3200 - 6400 (Available when Using P, S, A or M Mode), Lowest ISO Sensitivity: 100, Highest ISO Sensitivity: 6400

Backlighting, Beach, Close Up, Dusk / Dawn, Easy Panorama, Fireworks Show, Food, Landscape, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Pet Portrait, Portrait, Scene Auto Selector, Snow, Sports, Sunset, Time Lapse Movie

Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portugese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukranian, Vietnamese
Battery Life (Shots Per Charge): 300 Shots, Tripod Socket: 1/4 inch (ISO 1222)
289 g (with Battery and SD Memory Card)
Aperture-priority Auto (A), Auto, Manual (M), Programmed Auto (P), Scene, Scene Auto Selector, Smart Portrait, Special Effects, Shutter-priority Auto (S)

Monitor Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode): 98% Horizontal, 98% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), Monitor Frame Coverage (Playback Mode): 100% Horizontal, 100% Vertical (Compared to Actual Picture), In Camera Image Editing: Crop, D-Lighting, Filter Effects, Glamour Retouch, Quick Retouch, Red-eye Correction, Small Picture
Exposure Control: Programmed Auto Exposure with Flexible Program, Aperture Priority Auto, Manual, Shutter Priority Auto
